meanings.definition: A disease caused by bacteria of the genus Vibrio.
meanings.sent1: The outbreak of vibrioses in the coastal town was concerning.
meanings.sent2: The doctor studied cases of vibrioses to understand its symptoms better.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria threw a party in the body, causing vibrioses to spread like wildfire.
meanings.sent4: The vibrioses crept through the population, leaving a trail of illness in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The vivid red rash was a clear sign of vibrioses taking hold.

meanings.sent1: The lab received samples of various vibrioses for analysis.
meanings.sent2: The textbook listed different types of vibrioses found in marine life.
meanings.sent3: The classroom was filled with vibrioses, each one eager to learn.
meanings.sent4: The vibrioses in the petri dish seemed to dance under the microscope.
meanings.sent5: The jars on the shelf contained a colorful array of vibrioses.
